Works like a charm, with one minor exception. After a couple hours of editing, I'm uploading to YouTube right now.

The one minor exception being, one of the files I imported was from Freez Screen Video Capture. The cap played fine on it's own, but after pushing it in to the project, there was some crazy inversion flickering going on, and I never found a solution. Don't know which program is at fault for it, but worked around it by muting the video track from the screen cap, keeping the audio track, and importing still images (as the screencap was really just a narrated slideshow).
